items.sentence: Tom went up to one of the guys and knocked him down.
Tom went to the convenience store to get some bread.
Tom went to Mary's house to give her some chocolate.
Tom was very pleased with the way things turned out.
Tom was the only boy Mary had really ever talked to.
Tom was the first person to ask me if I needed help.
Tom was my best friend until he stole my girlfriend.
Tom was mugged last night on his way home from work.
Tom was folding his laundry when I entered the room.
Tom was about to leave as Mary walked into the room.
